brands.name: H&M
brands.description: H&M offers fashion and quality at the best price in a sustainable way.

brands.name: Zara
brands.description: Zara is one of the largest international fashion companies and part of Inditex, one of the world's largest distribution groups.

brands.name: Uniqlo
brands.description: Uniqlo is a Japanese brand offering casual wear, with a focus on quality and minimalist design.

brands.name: Nike
brands.description: Nike is a global sportswear and fashion brand known for innovative athletic footwear and apparel.

brands.name: Adidas
brands.description: Adidas is a leader in the global sporting goods industry, offering a wide range of sportswear, footwear, and accessories.

brands.name: Gucci
brands.description: Gucci is an Italian luxury brand of fashion and leather goods, renowned for its bold designs and high-quality craftsmanship.

brands.name: Louis Vuitton
brands.description: Louis Vuitton is a French fashion house and luxury retail company known for its iconic bags and stylish accessories.

brands.name: Prada
brands.description: Prada is an Italian luxury fashion house specializing in high-end leather handbags, shoes, ready-to-wear, and accessories.
